text-input.name: profile-title
text-input.label: Your Portfolio Title
text-input.description: What should your portfolio be called? Your name perhaps or do you use an alias?

text-editor.name: details
text-editor.label: details
text-editor.value: Hi, my name is Jane Doe. I am a Web Designer, Illustrator working in Vienna, Austria. My passion is to create beautiful, fun designs with a modern touch. I am currently looking for jobs in Vienna, Austria. Shoot me and email or contact me through one of my social media links.

image-input.name: profile-picture
image-input.label: Logo(optional)
image-input.description: Do you want to display your logo as the Title instead of the title above?

text-input.name: link
text-input.label: Link Your Project
text-input.description: Want to link to your project? Add the url below

text-editor.name: description
text-editor.label: Project Description
text-editor.description: What is your project? When, where, why and how!

image-input.name: cover
image-input.label: cover-image
image-input.description: This will be the focus point for the project.

1.title: Wineo
1.description:
Godard single-origin coffee twee before they sold out, distillery whatever dolore narwhal ex squid proident art party. Heirloom sint church-key, direct trade lumbersexual McSweeney's Odd Future readymade. Chambray accusamus art party, put a bird on it adipisicing bitters labore meh pork belly aute.

Helvetica cold-pressed dolor, 3 wolf moon heirloom vegan consequat eiusmod velit umami scenester retro hashtag anim Brooklyn. Delectus Thundercats vinyl, Blue Bottle organic street art you probably haven't heard of them reprehenderit. Cardigan ugh leggings YOLO elit mumblecore. Hashtag street art four dollar toast meditation plaid quis.
